title: Dad Jokes Christmas Gift Book
description: Everybody loves dad jokes, and Ralph Lane is the king of these witty knee-slappers. While other dad joke books are proud of how bad their jokes are, Ralph Lane is proud of how good his jokes are. And the fun doesn't stop at hilarious jokes. Each joke in the Ralph Lane Dad Jokes series is illustrated for an even better reading experience.If you loved Ralph Lane's original "Dad Jokes Gift Book," you're in for a treat. The "Dad Jokes Christmas Gift Book" is filled with the best holiday jokes you've ever seen or heard. Everyone will love this book and laugh so hard that egg nog will spurt out of their nostrils. It is perfect as a Christmas gift, stocking stuffer or gift basket addition. In fact it was voted the best Christmas gift of the year by both GiftBasketInformation.com and BestHolidayBooks.com.Don't just buy one copy. Buy enough "Dad Jokes Christmas Gift Books" for everyone on your holiday gift list. It's the type of joke book that you'll read over and over again. It's filled with jokes about Santa, reindeer, snowmen and holiday hi-jinx. Hopefully telling these jokes around the Christmas tree will become part of your annual holiday tradition. And Ralph Lane won't even be insulted if you keep a spare copy of his books on the back of your toilet as essential bathroom reading.What did Santa say when he got the Dad Jokes Christmas Gift Book in his stocking on Christmas morning?"Thanks for awesome gift, but next time, put it in a stocking I'm not wearing."The Dad Jokes Gift Books make the perfect present for Christmas, birthdays, Father's Day, all holidays and special occasions. Order your copies today, and let the fun begin!!
author: Ralph  Lane
